column4: what is the deal here with ubuntu? i know that is supports my hardware and all but all it is getting is 640x480 resolution ?
i tried setting the xorg.conf to use only 800X600 and 1024x768 .. still only doing 640x480 resolution?
this is very frustrating . I like the OS and all but i hate 640x480 resolution ?
you may have chosen a refresh too high for those resolutions. Drop back to 60hz and if it works, raise it incrementally.
